trans-unit.source:
You can create icons using [favicon.io](https://favicon.io) or [realfavicongenerator.net](https://realfavicongenerator.net/svg-favicon/).
### Dynamic color replacement
Following colors properties will be replaced with the hex color value from the choosen color:
* `var(--bg-light)` * `var(--fg-light)` * `var(--bg-dark)` * `var(--fg-dark)` * `var(--main-light)` * `var(--main-dark)` * `var(--minor-light)` * `var(--minor-dark)` * `var(--header-light)` * `var(--header-dark)`
### Additional articles
[Building an adaptive favicon](https://web.dev/articles/building/an-adaptive-favicon)
